title: Australia
creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, Richard Mason, Tourism Australia and Film Australia
brief_description: A tourist promotion film showing all of the major regions of Australia. Includes fauna, recreation activities, natural features and urban scenes. Non-narrated. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
